import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FilterService } from './filter.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-filter', templateUrl: './filter.component.html', styleUrls: ['./filter.component.css'] }) export class FilterComponent implements OnInit{ filter : any = [] constructor(private FilterService:FilterService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.filerdata() } filerdata(){ this.FilterService.getAllData().subscribe((res:any)=>{ console.log('table is',res.data) this.filter = res.data; console.log('bab is',this.filter.id) }) } }
